name: WindowStateInsert
query:
insert into windows (time, isopen, room)
values ('{{{msg.payload.time}}}', {{{msg.payload.isopen}}}, '{{{msg.payload.room}}}')

func:
msg.topic = 'window'
return msg;

name: DoorInsert
query:
insert into door (time, state, room)
values ('{{{msg.payload.time}}}', {{{msg.payload.state}}}, '{{{msg.payload.room}}}')

name: LightInsert
query:
INSERT INTO lights (room, time, state) VALUES ('{{{msg.payload.room}}}','{{{msg.payload.time}}}',
{{{msg.payload.state}}});

name: FridgeShow
query:
SELECT * FROM FridgeDoor
ORDER BY time;

'{{{msg.payload.device}}}', {{{msg.payload.state}}});
